long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listy | Engage Smarter on LinkedIn
Create custom lists and skip straight to the posts that matter.

Listy is a Chrome extension designed to optimize your LinkedIn engagement. Build tailored lists of profiles you care about and interact with their content directly—no connections required. Focus your time and energy on meaningful interactions while avoiding the noise of the LinkedIn feed.

Key Features:
↳ Custom Lists: Create and organize lists of profiles, from prospects to thought leaders, for targeted engagement.

↳ Direct Interaction: Engage with posts from your selected profiles without endless scrolling or sending connection requests.

↳ Privacy First: No need to connect your LinkedIn account—Listy works independently to keep your information secure.
